statfuncs module¶

Statistics module¶

Functions for different statistical calculations.

Created: Autumn 2016 Authors: Petter Lind & David Lindstedt

statfuncs.cdd_calc(data, thr=1.0)[source]¶

Calculates the Consecutive Dry Days index (CDD). Parameters ———- data: array

1D-array of precipitation timeseries in mm
thr: float
Value of threshold to define dry day. Default 1 mm.
dlen: list
list with lengths of each dry day event in timeseries
statfuncs.ehi_calc(data, thrs_95)[source]¶

Calculates Excessive Heat Index (EHI). Parameters ———- data: array

1D-array of temperature input timeseries
thrs_95: float
95th percentile daily mean value from climatology
statfuncs.hotdays_calc(data, thrs_75)[source]¶

Calculates number of hotdays: days with mean temperature above the 75th percentile of climatology. Parameters ———- data: array

1D-array of temperature input timeseries
thrs_75: float
75th percentile daily mean value from climatology
statfuncs.moving_average(a, n=3)[source]¶
statfuncs.rolling_sum(a, n=3)[source]¶
statfuncs.run_mean(x, N)[source]¶

Calculating running mean. x is the data vector, N the window.

statfuncs.tropnights_calc(data)[source]¶

Calculates number of tropical nights: days with min temperature not below 20 degrees C. Parameters ———- data: array

1D-array of minimum temperatures timeseries in degrees Kelvin
